titleStmt.title: An epilogue to the tragedy of the Church of England being a necessary consideration and brief resolution of the chief controversies in religion that divide the western church : occasioned by the present calamity of the Church of England : in three books ... / by Herbert Thorndike.
titleStmt.author: Thorndike, Herbert, 1598-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. and T.R. for J. Martin, J. Allestry, and T. Dicas ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
I. The principles of christian truth -- II. The covenant of grace -- III. The lawes of the church.
